## :wave: Hello there!
> :rotating_light: Please follow the steps below to create a pull request

1. Copy the correct template for your pull request:
   - :bug: Are you fixing a bug? Copy this template: [Bug Fix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Elanum/Gonk/develop/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/bug-fix.md)
   - :chart_with_upwards_trend: Are you improving performance? Copy this template: [Performance Improvement](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Elanum/Gonk/develop/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/performance-improvement.md)
   - :memo: Are you updating documentation? Copy this template: [Update Documentation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Elanum/Gonk/develop/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/update-documentation.md)
   - :sparkles: Are you adding or changing funtionality? Copy this template: [Update Features](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Elanum/Gonk/develop/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/update-features.md)
2. Replace this text with the contents of the template
3. Fill in all sections of the template
4. Click "Create pull request"
